name: Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar
author: 1COOKIEGIRL
summary: This is a great Christmas or birthday gift. Everybody loves to bake, yet no one has the time. It is a thoughtful gift for the busy person in your life. And by the way, the cookies are delicious!
directions: Combine all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt
In a 1 quart wide mouth canning jar, layer dark brown sugar, white sugar, cocoa, chopped pecans, and chocolate chips
Pack everything down firmly before you add flour mixture, it will be a snug fit
Attach a tag with the following instructions:  Chocolate Cookie Mix in a Jar:  1
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) 2
Empty cookie mix into large bowl
Mix in 3/4 cup softened butter or margarine, 1 egg, slightly beaten, and 1 teaspoon vanilla
Shape into walnut size balls, and place 2 inches apart on a parchment lined baking sheet
Cool 5 minutes on baking sheet, then move to wire racks
